items.title: Bank of America’s Moynihan says AI’s economic benefit is ‘kicking in more’
items.description: Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said AI is starting to have a bigger impact on the U.S. economy.

items.title: Trump team triples bonus to $3,000 for migrants who self-deport
items.description: The $3,000 stipend is triple the $1,000 payout the department unveiled in May.

items.title: ‘That really stuck’: Here’s how a 1970s campaign to sell Kentucky Fried Chicken with a bottle of wine became a Japanese Christmas tradition
items.description: "Still today, you have to order your KFC months in advance to make sure that you’re going to get it at Christmas Day.”

items.title: You could win $1.6 billion with the right Powerball ticket, officials say
items.description: The Powerball jackpot now stands at an estimated $1.6 billion, making it one of the largest lottery prizes in U.S. history, Powerball officials said S...

items.title: Evita Duffy-Alonso, daughter of transportation secretary, accuses TSA of ‘absurdly invasive’ pat-down
items.description: “All this for an unconstitutional agency that isn’t even good at its job,” she said, adding that she nearly missed her flight.
